mapper.select: SELECT CUST_USER_IDX AS CUST_USER_IDX , USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , USER_ID AS USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD , USER_NAME AS USER_NICKNAME , USER_AUTH AS USER_AUTH FROM CUST_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE UJT, CU FROM USER_JWT_TOKEN AS UJT INNER JOIN CUST_USER AS CU ON UJT.CUST_USER_IDX = CU.CUST_USER_IDX WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
